[Construction Scope of Work]
---------------------------

The Government of Canada's Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires construction services for physical security upgrades at the Embassy of Canada to Mali, situated in Bamako. The objective is to restore the Canadian facility to meet current safety standards.

The resources required for this project may include, but are not limited to, an architect, structural engineer, mechanical and electrical engineers, civil engineer, environmental engineer, interior designer, and other specialized professionals deemed necessary for completing the scope of work.
